name: Blast: A Tank Game
description:
Blast your way through challenging, yet cleverly designed levels in this addictive top-down tank shooter. Build the ultimate tank by earning upgrades that change its performance and looks!

Blast features an extensive tank upgrade system, which creates a unique and customizable gameplay experience. With 45 tank upgrades to choose from, the possibilities are endless.

Stunning visuals, immersive audio and a simple, intuitive control scheme make for a truly enjoyable experience.

Blast is a result of the hard work, passion and talent of a 16-year-old indie developer, based in South Africa.


Features:
• 30 unique and challenging levels in the Jungle biome. More biomes coming soon!
• Impressive tank upgrade system featuring 45 different upgrades.
• Consumables: airstrike, shield and med kit.
• Action packed with stunning 3D visuals with a beautiful art style.
• Gripping music and audio.
• Customizable player colour.


Have a blast, and expect to see more coming soon to this App Store exclusive!
